titleStmt.title: The scornfull Quakers answered and their railing reply refuted by the meanest of the Lord's servants Magnus Byne.
titleStmt.author: Byne, Magnus.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Bentley for Andrew Crook ...,

notesStmt.note: A reply to Thomas Lawson's writings.
